title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE

text: It's the brilliant combination of my last two plans. Scott Tenorman's favorite band is Radiohead, right?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Yeah.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: So, I realized, "What if we got Radiohead to come here to South Park?" right? Then they could meet Scott Tenorman  and  see him get his weiner bitten off by a pony!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: ...What?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Don't you see? If I can get this pony to bite off Scott's weiner in front of Radiohead, then Scott would cry. And if Scott cries, then Radiohead will say Scott Tenorman is totally not cool! And that would make Scott Tenorman wanna die!!  Okay, I'll keep working on the pony, you guys go get Radiohead to play here! Ready? Break!!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: You're such a dumbass, Cartman.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: ...Fine, I'll do it myself!! You guys just watch!!  Ready, pony?  Bite it! Yes!!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: London Recording Studio, day. Inside, Radiohead prepares to record. One of them is on the floor reading fan mail

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Thom, will you stop reading fan mail? We have work to do.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Just a second, fellas. Listen to this:

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
role: My name is Eric Cartman. I'm a young, supple eight-year-old boy
text: from South Park, Colorado. I am writing to you because of a kid I know named Scott Tenorman. Scott is fifteen, and I'm afraid he has cancer. In his ass. Radiohead is his favorite band, and it would make his short life if you could find it in your hearts to visit him before he dies alone and scared. Won't you please consider it? I don't think he'll make it past... next Tuesday around 5.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Wow, we have to go.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: To Colorado? But we have an album to mix.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Didn't you hear the letter?? This poor kid has cancer! In his ass!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Scott's house, day. A phone rings. Scott answers it in the living room.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Hello?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Scott Tenorman?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: What do you want?!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: We just wanna warn you: Eric Cartman, the fourth grader, is goin' tuh try and trick you somehow into getting your weiner bitten off by a pony who lives at Denkins' ranch.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: How do you know?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: 'Cause, we're his friends.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Thennn why are you telling me?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: 'Cause we hate him.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Well, we just thought we'd let you know. See ya.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: See ya.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: At the front door

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Hello, Scott!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Hey.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: I was just stopping by to invite you to my Chili Con Carnival. It's a chili cook-off with rides.  Everyone's coming, and I wanted to drop by your invitation personally!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Ooo, a chili carnival, huh? That sounds great.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Yeah! There is even gonna be a big surprise, so you won't wanna miss it, Scott.Oh, and here! Here's a coupon good for one free pony ride!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Wow, a pony ride. Neat.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh, it will be very neat, Scott.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Gosh. Chili, rides, and ponies? What more could I want?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: A little penis-biting, perhaps?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: What?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Uhnothing, nuhothing! So you'll come for sure then, Scott?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: How can I turn it down?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Sweeet. Killer. Bye, Scott.  Ohoho, you are good, Eric. You are very, very good.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: back in the living room

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Mom, Dad, that was my good friend Eric at the door? He told me that there's a starving pony at Denkins' ranch that's been abandoned.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh dear.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Yeah, I feel really bad. But I don't know how I can help it, because I have a lot of homework to do.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: :	 Well, don't you worry, Scott. Your mom and I can go get the pony and have it taken to an animal shelter.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: We sure can.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Wow, would you really? I feel so much better now.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh, Scott, you're such a loving, caring boy. I'm so proud of you.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: I'm proud of you, too, Mom.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Let's go, hon.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Let's.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: In the kitchen. Scott is cooking up something... his friends arrive

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: What are you doing, Scott?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: What's it look like? I'm making chili. Did you bring the goods?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: We got everyone we could find to chip in.  There are pubes from just about every single kid in town.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Awesome!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh, dude!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: The little fat kid thinks he's gonna get revenge tomorrow. We'll see how he likes it when I tell him he just ate the pubes of every kid in town!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Yeah!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: South Park, next day. The Chili Con Carnival is in full swing. People have already arrived. Stan and Kyle walk up

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh, hello, guys! Thanks for coming to my Chili Con Carnival!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: This is the dumbest thing you've ever done, Cartman.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Ohoho, it won't be so dumb when Scott Tenorman arrives. I suggest you stay to see the fireworks!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oho, we will. Trust us. We won't miss this.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: What's so funny?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh nothing, it's just cool how you're gonna get Scott Tenorman back. Is Radiohead here yet?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Not yet, but they will be.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Yeah, sure.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Hello, Eric!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Hey, Chef.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: I made some chili to enter into the contest.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: What contest?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: This is a chili cook-off, ain't it?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Huh? Oh. Yeah, I guess it is. Uh, here, Chef, just put it over here.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: It's my special recipe.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Scott Tenorman!!! How are you, Scott? Thanks so much for coming!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh, I wouldn't miss this for anything.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Likewise. Well, come on, you've got to see the pony!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Just a second: don't you- wanna taste my chili first?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Well, e-yeah, but, there's a special guest coming, and I want you to be near the pony when they arrive.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Well I don't want it to get cold. I think I can win first prize.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Alright, Scott, uh. Let's go over to the judging table and we'll try the chili first.  Goddamnit!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Cartman's house, the judging table. Cartman and Scott take their seats. Behind Scott stand Butters, Kyle, Stan, and Scott's friends. Behind Cartman stand Bebe, Clyde, and Token

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Alright, I guess we should taste each other's chili, huh?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Huh, this chili looks pretty good. Weh, here's mine.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Mmm. Ah, I don't know. Your chili is pretty good, Cartman, but I think mine is better. Try it.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Alright.  Hey, this is great!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Eh, it's a special recipe

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Gawh, this is really good, Scott!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: I'm glad you like it so much, because now that you're almost finished, I have some'in' to tell you.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: What? You mean about how you put pubes in your chili?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: What?!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Yehes, I'm afraid this isn't your chili, Scott. I switched it with Chef's.  It's delicious, Chef. I hadn't planned on that. What I did plan on, however, was that my friends, Stan and Kyle, would betray me and warn you that the Chili Con Carnival was a trap.  I assumed that they would tell you that I had trained Denkins' pony to bite off your weiner. What they didn't tell you was that Denkins is a crazy redneck who shoots trespassers on sight. Knowing that you would try and do somethng to the pony, I warned Mr. Denkins that violent pony killers were in the area. I also know that you wouldn't go yourself, for fear of having your weiner bitten off. You would most likely send your parents.  And, I'm afraid that when Mr. Denkins spotted them on his property, he shot and killed both your parents.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Well, they was trespassin' and I was protectin' myself. I, I have my rights.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: My... mom and dad are... dead?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: I came just in time to see Mr. Denkins giving his report to Officer Barbrady. And of course, to steal the bodies... After a night with the hacksaw, I was all ready to put on my Chili Con Carnival, so that I could tell you personally about your parents' demise! And of course, feed you your chili.  Do you like it? Do you like it, Scott?  I call it, "Mr. & Mrs. Tenorman Chili."

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh my God!  Oh my God!!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Nyahnyahnyahnyah nyah nyah! I made you eat your parents! Nyahnyahnyahnyah nyah nyah!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Jesus Christ, dude!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: My mom and dad are dead!  No! NOOO!!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Uhm, excuse me?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Who are you?

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: We're that band, Radiohead.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Jesus!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Jeez, what a li'l crybaby!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Are you gonna cry all day, crybaby??

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: You know, everyone has problems; it doesn't mean you have to be a little crybaby about it.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Come om, guys, let's go. This kid is totally not cool.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Yeah, that's the most uncool kid I've ever met.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Little crybaby!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: No, wait! Waaiittt!! Oh my God, Oh my Gaawwwd!!  Noooo!

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Yes! Yesss!! Oh, let me taste your tears, Scott!  Mm, your tears are so yummy and sweet.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Dude, I think it might be best for us to never piss Cartman off again.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Good call.

title: SCOTT TENORMAN MUST DIE
text: Oh, the tears of unfathomable sadness! My-ymmuy.  Mm-yummy you guys!  Yuppitibut, that's all, folks!
